properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens. Should be a strong, random string.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds. Default is 86400000 (24 hours).

properties.name: jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in milliseconds. Default is 7 days (604800000ms).

properties.name: jwt.max-refresh-tokens-per-user
properties.description: Maximum number of active refresh tokens allowed per user. Older tokens are revoked when limit is exceeded.

properties.name: file.upload.directory
properties.description: Directory path where uploaded files will be stored.

properties.name: file.max-size
properties.description: Maximum allowed size for uploaded files in bytes.

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS configuration.

properties.name: app.rate-limit.login.requests-per-minute
properties.description: Maximum number of login requests allowed per minute.

properties.name: app.rate-limit.api.requests-per-minute
properties.description: Maximum number of API requests allowed per minute.

properties.name: app.keep-alive.enabled
properties.description: Enable keep-alive mechanism for Render.com free tier.

properties.name: app.keep-alive.url
properties.description: URL to ping for keep-alive mechanism.

properties.name: spring.session.store-type
properties.description: Store type for Spring Session (e.g., jdbc, redis, none).
